summary: Lacking a formal narrative, Warhol's art house classic follows various residents of the Chelsea Hotel in 1966 New York City, presented in a split screen with a single audio track in conjunction with one side of screen.

keywords: multi screen|duo vision|new york city|chelsea hotel|reality
title: Chelsea Girls
